entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Support inferring rate-limited endpoints in OpenAPI #44810
  • Support disabling auto-injection of browser refresh JavaScript via launch profile property #44805
    .NET 8 Planning
  • AspNetCore Multi-Tenant Jwt Bearer Token Configuration #44804
  • [Tracking] JWT requirements #44803
    .NET 8 Planning
  • dynamic endpoint in controller #44790
  • Support object content along with custom status code in Results API #44789

Closed

  • Blazor server doesn't render pages properly with custom WebApplicationOptions #44439
    .NET 8 Planning
  • NavigationLock throws uncaught JSDisconnectedException on Blazor Server #44795
    7.0.x
  • Compression error in br encoding depending on razor cshtml format #44667
  • Microsoft Dev Box integration with dotnet/aspnetcore #42004
    8.0-MQ
  • Binding to input datetime-local deletes day when entering 0 first #44796
  • Perf improvement: single_query #44571
  • Blazor JSDisconnectedException caught as AggregateException from TaskScheduler.UnobservedTaskException #44684

PullRequests

Created

  • !fixup! Correct CodeQL3000 setup #44809
    area-infrastructure
  • Remove DOTNET_CLI_DO_NOT_USE_MSBUILD_SERVER workaround #44808
    area-infrastructure
  • Backport 'Fix NavigationLock throwing a JSDisconnectedException on browser close in Blazor Server' #44806
    Servicing-consider, area-blazor, 7.0.x
  • [Templates] Fix links to http://useiconic.com #44801
    Servicing-approved, area-mvc
  • Enable CA1854 #44799
    community-contribution
  • Update for more accessible colors in dev exception page #44798
    area-runtime, community-contribution

Merged

  • Fix NavigationLock throwing a JSDisconnectedException on browser close in Blazor Server #44800
    area-blazor
  • Use TryGetValue() for dictionary lookup #44791
    Perf, area-identity, community-contribution, 8.0-preview1
  • Update SDK to 8.0.100-alpha.1.22531.1 #44797
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1
  • Build public redist for source-build #44780
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `6a0e1ae` to `c824ca9` #44792
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `e07617d` to `3026483` #44793
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1

Updated

  • Set ApiParameterDescription.Type to `string` for Simple Types #44747
    area-web-frameworks
  • [release/7.0] Add CodeQL3000 run to aspnetcore-ci-official #44717
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • Initial Form-binding support #44653
    feature-minimal-actions, area-web-frameworks
  • [release/6.0] Add CodeQL3000 run to aspnetcore-ci-official #44719
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • [release/2.1] Add CodeQL3000 run to aspnetcore-ci-official #44720
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 2.1.x
  • fix trace id value, introduce traceparent #44680
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2033389 #44686
    area-infrastructure
  • test install-scripts #40061
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Remove premature QuicListener.IsSupported check #44755
    area-runtime, servers-kestrel
  • Experiment with named pipes transport #44426
    area-runtime
